profile:
MKC Renovations
Our Foundation for Success 

We are a family owned and operated, well-established, renovation company. We opened our doors in 2004. Based on trust, word of mouth referrals, and quality workmanship, we have humbly grown to become a dependable resource to all our valued customers. We are passionate about home improvement & renovations and always strive to deliver the best results for our great customers.

​

In doing so, we ensure that our clients receive the most professional services and top quality products. We carry an ever-present awareness that we play a role in adding increased value to your property along with fulfilling the practical and aesthetic outcomes. We believe that every property and space is unique, we do not believe in a “one-size-fits-all” approach when it comes to investments of this magnitude. Instead, when working with our clients, we prefer to design a tailor-made renovation or remodeling plan, just for you, that will perfectly suit your particular needs.

​

With exceptional customer service, professionalism and quality being our cornerstones, our ultimate goal is not only to meet your expectations but to continuously exceed them.
